Windlord:

Windlord was furious, how could they have done that???? "Kup, 
whatever happens don't let the children alone???? I will go to... see 
ya in a later"


Windlord furious shot two feather missiles against Destructor


-- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> OOC: I hope you dont mind a little CC. I posted for a little damage 
to Hydras, but nothing critical.
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus brought his arms down in a "x" formation, forcing the 
swords, and Hydras' arms down. Rodimus then grabbed Hydras around the 
wrist with his left hand. He dug his saw which was in the place of 
his right hand, down into Hydras' arm. With his balance on his left 
arm, Roddy flipped both legs up to double dropkick Hydras. After 
hitting this he back flips away and to his feet.
> Just then Perceptor is heard over the comm system.
> Rodimus stands motionless, and optics look empty, like all hope had 
been lost. But then...
> Rodimus Prime: Enough of this! Maximals, kill these bastards in 
cold fluid!
> Rodimus' face shows nothing but hate. He grits his teeth together, 
while letting out an yell that could destroy an audio receptor. He is 
almost fomeing at the mouth, with the mixed mech fluids that leak 
from it. The anger causes his normally blue optic sensors to turn a 
crimson red. His gaze locked on Hydras.
> Rodimus empties his mouth, spitting all the energon and other mech 
fluids from his mouth at Hydras.
> Rodimus Prime: On this day, Galvatron, I'll finally KILL YOU!!!!!!!!
> Rodimus transformes to car mode and fires his propulsion rockets. 
Full power all at once, sending Rodimus Prime at Hydras' gut at an 
airborn 300mph!
> : : Kup : :
> At the Maximal base Kup was about to take Elita from Cam...
> Kup: Give her here...
> When Perceptos message came over the comm sytem as well as a 
picture on all of the monitors.
> Kup: By primus no... How could they?! She was a mother, a good bot, 
she didn't deserve this. They targeted her just to get at Rodimus...
> Kup drops to the floor.
> Kup: Cam, you may have to help with that baby more if you can. Her 
father is the commander, and she just lost her mother...
> Kup looks up at the picture of Perceptor on the monitor.
> Kup: Rodimus will lose all control now. I fear that are leader is 
gone, and a killing machine is in his place. I actually pitty those 
Predacons now, for what Rodimus will do to them. May primus have 
pitty on their sparks...
> OOC: I hope I really showed the emotion I meant to in this post. 
The hatred, the sarrow, all of it.

> 
> "To all maxiamls, and specially to you... RODIMUS PRIME, Auto-
fools'

this

> Maixmals, if you attemp to reprogram again her, that will end in 
her 
> death... I'm not kidding... I set her a virus that will destroy her 
> spar if its detects a not allowed reprogramation prosses... I 
erased 
> all her memories so for her you will be enemies and as enemies, she 
> will attack you... MAster Hydras,I finished, If you desire to say 
> anything else..."
> 
>
